page.description: AlphaDAO calls UpdateProgress() repeatedly as rows are processed.
page.syntax: UpdateProgress( Context as P, RowsUpdated as N, RowsExpected as N, [ BYREF Cancel as L ] )

argument.name: Context
argument.description: The object on which the function is called (generally the connection or a result set).

argument.name: RowsUpdated
argument.description: The number of rows successfully updated.

argument.name: RowsExpected
argument.description: The number of rows to be updated. Note: The number of rows in an applied result set is not always known. In this case, RowsExpected will be -1.

argument.name: Cancel
argument.description: Optional. Default = .F. To cancel the execution of the event, set Cancel = .T. .
